node.title: COVID-positive Czech President swears in Prime Minister from transparent box
node.alt: Man sitting in a wheelchair with a face mask in a glass box behind a man outside the glass box wearing a suit and mask
node.description: Czech Republic President Milos Zeman arrived to the ceremony in a wheelchair escorted by a medic in full protective gear and remained separated from other government officials.
node.content:
["Staying at a distance from other officials, the Czech\u00a0Republic's President, Milos Zeman, has sworn\u00a0in the country's new Prime Minister, Petr Fiala, following\u00a0last month's parliamentary election.", "Mr Zeman, was separated from Mr Fiala and the other officials by transparent panels during the ceremony at the presidential chateau in Lany, west of Prague because the President tested positive for COVID-19\u00a0last week and must isolate.", "The country has been facing a record surge in a new wave of COVID-19 infections.", "Its new daily increase hit a record high of almost 28,000 cases on Thursday, and the country has recorded more than\u00a02.1 million cases since the start of the pandemic.\u00a0", "Mr Zeman was only discharged from the capital's military hospital on Saturday, after\u00a0more than a month's treatment for an unspecified illness.", "He was\u00a0taken back to hospital hours after being released after testing positive for COVID-19.", "Mr\u00a0Zeman\u00a0had\u00a0received three COVID-19 vaccine shots, and had\u00a0no symptoms, the hospital said.", "He was rushed to the hospital a day after the election and was treated in an intensive care unit.", "His condition was attributed to an unspecified chronic disease.", "", "
Czech Prime Minister Milos Zeman wished the new leader, Petr\u00a0Fiala, \"success.\"(AP:\u00a0 Roman Vondrous)
", "The new government will have to tackle a fresh\u00a0wave of COVID-19\u00a0that is threatening to overwhelm hospitals as well as\u00a0an energy crisis, after the collapse of a large electricity provider.\u00a0", "The\u00a0Prime Minister also called on people to get vaccinated against COVID-19 and praised medical staff as cases were on the rise.", "Opponents of vaccination and the government's anti-coronavirus measures gathered in their thousands in Prague later on Sunday for a protest rally decrying such moves as a ban on Christmas markets.", "Only 58.5 per cent of the country's population are vaccinated against COVID-19, compared to the European Union average of 65.8 per cent, according to the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control.", "Mr Fiala is expected to appoint his cabinet in mid-December.", "Mr Zeman said he would meet the candidates for the ministerial roles\u00a0between Monday and December 13 to discuss their future jobs, despite the choice of candidates being the new Prime Minister's.", "Wires/ ABC"]
